titles.title: Recommending that the House of Representatives find Mark F. Pomerantz in contempt of Congress for failing to comply with the terms of a lawful and valid congressional subpoena.
Recommending that the House of Representatives find Mark F. Pomerantz in contempt of Congress for failing to comply with the terms of a lawful and valid congressional subpoena.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: This resolution directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives to take action to enforce the subpoena of Mark Pomerantz and find him in contempt of Congress.
